quote: It is said that love does not last, that it is just a momentary spell cast upon your soul by some higher power, or a small trick of the mind. If this were all true, there would be no story to tell.
quote_letters: IT IS SAID THAT LOVE DOES NOT LAST THAT IT IS JUST A MOMENTARY SPELL CAST UPON YOUR SOUL BY SOME HIGHER POWER OR A SMALL TRICK OF THE MIND IF THIS WERE ALL TRUE THERE WOULD BE NO STORY TO TELL
